function.name: isdivisor
function.short: Array elements that are divisors of zero

long.para: isdivisor(X, tol) returns logical 1 (true) for array elements that are divisors of zero.
The second parameter specifies a tolerance. If omitted the default is eps.

references.reference: Stephen J. Sangwine and Daniel Alfsmann, 'Determination of the Biquaternion Divisors of Zero, Including the Idempotents and Nilpotents', Advances in Applied Clifford Algebras, 20, (2010), 401–410. 10.1007/s00006-010-0202-3.
